title: JSC Siverschyna And Slobozhanshchina Directions Ruscian Army Shelled Mid Buda, Popivka, Kindrativka, Oleksandrivka, Great ...
content: At sivershchyna and slBozhanschyna directions Russian Army Shelled Seredyna Buda, Popivka, Kindratyvka, Oleksandrivka, Velyka Pysarivka of Sumy. Russia Aviation Conduched Aircrakes at Kozacha Lopan, Vovchansk, Okhrymivka of Kharkiv Region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine Says
